dmca.title: Web DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
Hi,

We are sorry to report that your members have posted images that breach the copyright of our World Guide sites.

Therefore, we wish to issue the following DMCA complaint;

1. MR. MARTIN TREASURE

2.The images copied are as follows:

http://afifa-hifzhan-fathur.blogspot.co.uk/2012/06/dengan-adanya-internet-dan-mr-google.html
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-48IHoGKxdcY/T9h567tO7cI/AAAAAAAABCY/U-fPsKTg6Go/s1600/germany-map.png
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-48IHoGKxdcY/T9h567tO7cI/AAAAAAAABCY/U-fPsKTg6Go/s400/germany-map.png
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-48IHoGKxdcY/T9h567tO7cI/AAAAAAAABCY/U-fPsKTg6Go/s320/germany-map.png
http://misswindyhilda.blogspot.co.uk/2012/07/germany.html
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rmA1VOP3xlg/T_h1MpobiYI/AAAAAAAAAro/UjhcUEvXFw0/s640/images.jpg
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-rmA1VOP3xlg/T_h1MpobiYI/AAAAAAAAAro/UjhcUEvXFw0/s1600/images.jpg
http://richard-strauss-bio.blogspot.co.uk/2011/02/biographical-information-richard.html
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-y7ozmqU3n5g/TX-jUn3iwDI/AAAAAAAAAQs/EP-9yKf808s/s200/germany_map.jpg
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-y7ozmqU3n5g/TX-jUn3iwDI/AAAAAAAAAQs/EP-9yKf808s/s1600/germany_map.jpg

3. The original images can be viewed here:

http://www.germany.world-guides.com/
http://www.world-guides.com/images/germany/germany_map.jpg

4.  Contact: [redacted] - director TravelSmart Ltd
Tel: +[redacted]
Email: info@world-guides.com
Address: [redacted], Frome, Somerset, England BA11 2DL

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by World Guides.

6. I hereby state under penalty of perjury that this information is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the infringed materials.


Many thanks once again for your help, please advise if you require any further information.

I look forward to hearing from you shortly.

MARTIN
